11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Umm Hisham bint Harithah bin An-Nu'man said:"I only learned :Qaf. By the Glorious Quran.' Behind the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ); he used to recite it in Subh

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الصُّبْحِ بِـ { ق }
